mapper.insert: insert into tb_item_cat (parent_id, name, status, sort_order, is_parent, created, updated) values (#{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update tb_item_cat set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort_order = #{sortOrder,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_parent = #{isParent,jdbcType=BIT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, name, status, sort_order, is_parent, created, updated from tb_item_cat
